title: Looking to Buy - Lajoie and Joss Portrait Cards
author: EddiesDryGoods

posts.post_title: Looking to Buy - Lajoie and Joss Portrait Cards
posts.post_content: Please PM with price. Looking for sub-5 graded cards.
I should have a batting pose T206 Lajoie by the end of the month, after it comes back from SGC. It will probably grade 3-4.
